content.2: Take with you words, and turn to the
content.3: Asshur shall not save us; we will not ride upon horses: neither will we say any more to the work of our hands,
content.4: I will heal their backsliding, I will love them freely: for mine anger is turned away from him.
content.5: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon.
content.6: His branches shall spread, and his beauty shall be as the olive tree, and his smell as Lebanon.
content.7: They that dwell under his shadow shall return; they shall revive
